config.name: highPA
config.description: Select if the High Power Amplifier on the device should be used

options.name: No whitener, dynamically IEEE 802.15.4g compatible 16/32-bit CRC
Dynamically IEEE 802.15.4g compatible whitener and 16/32-bit CRC

config.name: preambleMode
config.default: Send 0 as the first preamble bit

options.name: Send 0 as the first preamble bit
Send 1 as the first preamble bit
Send same first preamble bit in preamble and sync word
Send different first preamble bit in preamble and sync word

config.name: syncWordLength
config.description: Number of bits in Sync Word.

config.name: syncWord
config.description: Complete Sync Word. Number of bits that is checked is determined by the Sync word length field.\n The bit order is determined by formatConf.bMsbFirst.

config.name: fixedPacketLength
config.description: The fixed packet length will not be part of the packet data.

config.name: address0
config.description: First allowed address. SmartRF Studio can support up to two addresses.

config.name: address1
config.description: Second allowed address. SmartRF Studio can support up to two addresses.
